COBOT_API_URL.description: Base URL for API calls. Something like https://:subdomain.cobot.me/api

COBOT_CLIENT_ID.description: Get your client ID at https://www.cobot.me/oauth2_clients

COBOT_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Get your client secret at https://www.cobot.me/oauth2_clients

HOST.description: Host name to listen for requests at

PORT.description: This is the port the API server will run on

DB_PATH.description: Path to SQLite database for storing client information.
